emailvalidation_text: To verify your email address {{ .Email }} on ItsYou.Online, click the button below.
emailvalidation_reason: You’re receiving this email because you recently created a new ItsYou.Online account or added a new email address. If this wasn’t you, please ignore this email.
emailvalidation_urlcaption: Button not working? Paste the following link into your browser:
passwordreset_text: To reset your ItsYou.Online password, click the button below.
passwordreset_reason: You’re receiving this email because you recently requested to reset your password at ItsYou.Online. If this wasn’t you, please ignore this email.
passwordreset_urlcaption: Button not working? Paste the following link into your browser:
organizationinvite_text: You have been invited to the {{ .Organization }} organization on It's You Online. Click the button below to accept the invitation.
organizationinvite_reason: You’re receiving this email because someone invited you to an organization at ItsYou.Online. If you think this was a mistake please ignore this email.
organizationinvite_subject: You have been invited to the {{ .Organization }} organization
organizationinvite_urlcaption: Button not working? Paste the following link into your browser:
smsconfirmation: Enter the code {{ .Code }} in the form to verify your phonenumber on itsyou.online, or use the link {{ .Link }}
smsconfirmationandlogin: Enter the code {{ .Code }} in the form to verify your phonenumber on itsyou.online and continue to login, or use this link: {{ .Link }}
authorizeorganizationsms: Enter the code {{ .Code }} in the form to continue signing in at itsyou.online to authorize the organization {{ .Organization }}, or use the link {{ .Link }}
signinsms: Enter the code {{ .Code }} in the form to continue signing in at itsyou.online, or use this link: {{ .Link }}
smsloggingin: You will be logged in within a few seconds
error: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later
smsconfirmedandlogin: Your phonenumber is confirmed, and you will be logged in within a few seconds
emailconfirmed: Your email address has been confirmed
return_to_window: You can now return to your active ItsYou.online window
